creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
See https://github.com/apache/httpd/commit/cab0bfbb2645bb8f689535e5e2834e2dbc23f5a5#commitcomment-20393588

php-fpm uses proxy:fcgi:// prefix to recognize apache
per-dir rewrite sets REDIRECT_URL
php-fpm thinks we're in some mod_fastcgi Action-type situation and looks at PATH_TRANSLATED instead of SCRIPT_FILENAME.

Need to be able to fix generic backends w/o confusing php-fpm
